TopicTitle: Weird phantom parts spontaneously generate and float past ship...

Articles.Content:
System info...


Processor    AMD FX(tm)-8350 Eight-Core Processor              4.00 GHz
Installed RAM    24.0 GB

Graphics card Radeon RX470 sapphire 4Gb
System type    64-bit operating system, x64-based processor
Pen and touch    No pen or touch input is available for this display
Edition    Windows 10 Home
Version    21H2
Installed on    ‎30/‎08/‎2022
OS build    19044.2846
Experience    Windows Feature Experience Pack 120.2212.4190.0

 

Doing the weekly challenge, trying to put a ship on Eve. Soon after launch, something strange caught my eye. I looked around but couldn't find what I had seen. Then it happened again, and again. These strange assemblages of parts, with a red/blue colour scheme would spontaneously generate close to, and beneath my ship. There was a  fuel tank with a mainsail(?) engine, a mk1 capsule, and a hand ful of smaller parts. Always the same parts. They would drift upwards and disappear. Trying to click on them with the curser did nothing. They would sometimes bump into my ship. It did no damage but it would send it tumbling. 

 

This continued throughout the flight, from soon after launch to landing in an Eve ocean.

I took screenshots, but somehow they haven't saved. I've now tried playing the game again, using the same save, but the glitch no longer happens.
